intents.name: Physical Presence
intents.response: Physical presence is not required to set up a company.

intents.name: Share Capital
intents.response: No paid-up share capital is required.

intents.name: NOC Required
intents.response: NOC is not required to incorporate a company.

intents.name: Zero Visa License
intents.response: Yes, you can get a license with a zero-visa at Meydan Free Zone.

intents.name: Combine Activities
intents.response: Yes, the combination of activities is permitted.

intents.name: Incorporation Documents
intents.response: Upon incorporation you will receive: Business License, Certificate of Formation, Share Register, Memorandum Of Association, and Lease Agreement.

intents.name: Maximum Shareholders
intents.response: A maximum of 100 shareholders are permitted on the license. If a company has more than 6 shareholders, they will need to pay AED 2000 for each additional shareholder beyond the initial 6. For example, if a company has 10 shareholders, they will need to pay AED 8000 (AED 2000 x 4) in addition to the standard licensing fees.

intents.name: Maximum Directors
intents.response: A maximum of 4 directors are permitted on the license.

intents.name: Maximum Managers
intents.response: A maximum of 1 manager is permitted on the license.

intents.name: Free Activities
intents.response: You can incorporate the company with 3 groups of activities without any additional charge.

intents.name: Additional Activities Cost
intents.response: The cost of additional activities is AED 1000 per activity. Approvals are required only for regulated activities.

intents.name: Multi-year Discount
intents.response: For multi-year license applications, 2 or more years for license and visa allocations, there is a standard discount of 15%.

intents.name: Multiple Companies Partner
intents.response: Yes, you can be a partner/shareholder in multiple companies.

intents.name: After Application Steps
intents.response: After submitting the new license application on the Meydan portal, the shareholders, manager, and directors will receive an email to complete: KYC, Accept/Reject, and Compliance form (if applicable). Only once the tasks are completed, our team will receive the application to review and proceed.

intents.name: License Validity
intents.response: Clients can choose the license validity during incorporation. The maximum period of validity is 10 years.

intents.name: Free Amendment Multi-year
intents.response: Yes, if the company holds a multi-year license, they will get a free amendment. For example: If a company has a 2-year license, the company will get 1 free amendment.

intents.name: License Grace Period
intents.response: A 30-day grace period is provided from the license expiry date to renew the license.

intents.name: License Penalty Fee
intents.response: Yes, the penalty fee is AED 500. This is a one-time fee.

intents.name: Immigration Card Grace Period
intents.response: No, there is no grace period provided when the immigration card expires.

intents.name: Immigration Card Penalty
intents.response: Yes, the penalty fee is AED 250 per month from the immigration card expiry date.

intents.name: Share Allocation Fraction
intents.response: No, the share allocation and the total share capital cannot be a fraction. It must be a whole number. For example: It cannot be 45.50%, it must be either 45% or 46%.

intents.name: Company Address
intents.response: Meydan Grandstand Next to Meydan Hotel 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.

intents.name: Audit Report
intents.response: The Audit Financial Statement Declaration report is required at the time of license renewal.

intents.name: Convert LLC Branch
intents.response: No, it's not possible to convert L.L.C to Branch or Branch to L.L.C.

intents.name: Shop Outside
intents.response: No, you need to have a shop within Meydan Free Zone area.

intents.name: Change Address
intents.response: Yes, the client can change the address in the business license, however, that address must be in the Meydan Free Zone area ONLY.

intents.name: Chamber of Commerce
intents.response: No, a Chamber of Commerce certificate will not be issued, however, Meydan Free Zone can assist you in registering for the Chamber of Commerce, but a process fee will be applied.

intents.name: Hold Property
intents.response: Yes, you can hold a property under your company.

intents.name: Visa Allocations
intents.response: 6 visa allocations are available to the company.

intents.name: DET Permit
intents.response: No, it is not possible to get a DET permit while having General Trading activity. The company needs one of the 44 mainland activities.

intents.name: Immigration Card Definition
intents.response: The immigration card is the card you are applying for to register your company details in the immigration system and it's mandatory to apply for it before applying for an employment OR investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Visa Allocation Definition
intents.response: Visa allocation is the visa quota in immigration and it's mandatory to apply for it before applying for an employment OR investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Immigration Visa Validity
intents.response: Immigration card and visa allocation have the same validity as the business license.

intents.name: Company Name Change Publication
intents.response: The publication time for changing the company name is 14 days.

intents.name: Own MOA
intents.response: The company can't provide its own MOA, however, if they want to add/remove/edit any clause in Meydan MOA they can request for it, and it will be subject to legal approval.

intents.name: Renewal with Amendment
intents.response: There is no extra fees required unless they added 4th activity group.

intents.name: Letters Validity
intents.response: The validity of corporate and employee letters is 30 days.

intents.name: Board Resolution Validity
intents.response: The board resolution must be valid for 15 days during application submission.

intents.name: Cancel License After Grace
intents.response: No, the company will not have to pay a penalty fee for the license, however, if the company has an immigration card, they need to pay the immigration card fine.

intents.name: Visa Allocation Renewal
intents.response: The visa allocation validity holds the expiry date of the License. Hence, should be renewed annually along with a Business License and Immigration Card.

intents.name: Immigration Amendment Name Change
intents.response: The company must apply for an immigration card amendment once the company name is changed.

intents.name: Shareholder Age
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum age for shareholders.

intents.name: Share Capital Limits
intents.response: There is no minimum and no maximum share capital.

intents.name: UAE Presence Visa
intents.response: An applicant has the option to process the Entry Visa outside the country. However, when the E-visa is issued, the applicant needs to be inside the UAE to complete the medical and Emirates ID procedures.

intents.name: Entry Visa Validity
intents.response: The entry permit is valid for 60 days from the date of issuance.

intents.name: Change of Status Validity
intents.response: The change of status is valid for 60 days from the date of issuance.

intents.name: Passport Visa Stamping
intents.response: Visa stamping is no longer mandatory, as per the new regulations in the UAE. The electronic version will suffice as Residency proof.

intents.name: Visa Before Biometrics
intents.response: You can submit the Residence Visa Application through the Portal. You may fill out and sign the Emirates ID declaration form for us to proceed with the Residence visa issuance before Biometrics.

intents.name: Biometrics Time
intents.response: The client has 60 days to complete the Biometrics.

intents.name: Investor Visa Minimum Age
intents.response: The minimum age is 18 years. You must have AED 50,000 share capital in the company to apply for an investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Investor Visa Maximum Age
intents.response: There is no age limitation. You must have AED 50,000 share capital in the company to apply for an investor/partner visa.

intents.name: Employee Visa Minimum Age
intents.response: The minimum age is 18 years.

intents.name: Employee Visa Maximum Age
intents.response: The maximum age is 60 years.

intents.name: Office Timing
intents.response: We are operating 24/7.

intents.name: Office Location
intents.response: We are next to Meydan Hotel, Meydan Grandstand, 6th Floor, Meydan Rd, Nad Al Sheba 1, Dubai, UAE.

intents.name: PO Box
intents.response: It's not allowed for the client to use Meydan's P.O. Box number; however, the client can apply for their P.O. Box number through Meydan Plus.

intents.name: Delivery Address
intents.response: Meydan Free Zone will not receive any delivery on the client's behalf unless they register for Mail management services.

intents.name: Share Desk Location
intents.response: Meydan Grandstand, 6th floor, Meydan Road, Nad Al Sheba, Dubai, U.A.E.
